title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Angola 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, gradually increasing from 2017 to 2018, roughly constant from 2018 to 2019, slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2023.

The line drastically increased by 2.7 times from Year 2015 to 2016,remained stable by 17.2 times from Year 2016 to 2017,increased by 8.0 times from Year 2017 to 2018,remained stable by 4.4 times from Year 2018 to 2019,increased by 4.3 times from Year 2019 to 2020, and lastly, increased by 2.5 times from Year 2020 to 2021.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 4.13 was reached at Year 2023
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 0.15 was reached at Year 2017

max_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, gradually increasing from 2017 to 2018, roughly constant from 2018 to 2019, slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2023.

The line significantly increased by 1.64 from Year 2015 to 2016,remained stable by 2.43 from Year 2016 to 2017,increased by 1.05 from Year 2017 to 2018,remained stable by 0.93 from Year 2018 to 2019,increased by 0.88 from Year 2019 to 2020, and lastly, increased by 1.72 from Year 2020 to 2021.
